title: 45. At What Cost - GoldLink
text: 14 Songs iTunes Review DC rapper GoldLink continues the forward momentum that turned heads on his 2015 mixtape And After That, We Didnâ€™t Talk . At What Cost unspools like a film, transitioning seamlessly from late night to early morning. â€œCrewâ€ pictures GoldLink stunting hard with Brent Faiyaz and Shy Glizzy. He can body a club track (â€œMeditationâ€) and shock listeners with a surprise ending. The fatalism that marked â€œWhen I Dieâ€ is back on â€œPray Everyday (Survivorâ€™s Guilt),â€ the realest song about self-medication since Kendrick Lamarâ€™s â€œSwimming Pools.â€ At What Cost connects soul with noir, inward-facing narratives, chopped, off-kilter beats, and nocturnal moods.
